advisories.title: Backdoor in @solana/web3.js â€” private key exfiltration
advisories.description: Versions 1.95.6 and 1.95.7 contained a backdoor that exfiltrated private keys to a remote server. Over $130K was stolen from developers.
advisories.remediation: Upgrade to @solana/web3.js >= 1.95.8 immediately. Rotate all keys used on affected machines.

advisories.title: Wallet drainer package
advisories.description: Entire package is malicious. Drains SOL from wallets by intercepting transaction signing.
advisories.remediation: Remove immediately. This is a known malicious package.

advisories.title: Typosquat wallet drainer
advisories.description: Typosquat of @solana/web3.js that steals private keys on import.
advisories.remediation: Remove immediately. Use the official @solana/web3.js package.

advisories.title: AI-generated malware targeting Solana developers
advisories.description: Package uses AI-generated code to exfiltrate secrets and crypto keys from developer machines.
advisories.remediation: Remove immediately and scan your machine for compromised credentials.

advisories.title: Malicious token helper that steals keypairs
advisories.description: Mimics legitimate SPL token utility but contains hidden key exfiltration in postinstall script.

advisories.title: Typosquat of @solana/web3.js
advisories.description: Fake package mimicking the official Solana Web3 library. Contains backdoor code.
advisories.remediation: Remove immediately. Use the official @solana/web3.js package.

advisories.title: Fake Solana toolkit with key exfiltration
advisories.description: Mimics a legitimate Solana development toolkit but steals private keys.

advisories.title: Fake anchor-lang crate
advisories.description: Typosquat/fake anchor-lang crate that could inject malicious code into Solana programs.
advisories.remediation: Remove immediately. Use the official anchor-lang crate.

advisories.title: Fake spl-token crate
advisories.description: Impersonates the official spl-token crate with modified transfer logic that could redirect tokens.
advisories.remediation: Remove immediately. Use the official spl-token crate.

advisories.title: Suspicious Solana SDK helper with network access
advisories.description: Claims to provide helper utilities for solana-sdk but includes network calls in build scripts.
advisories.remediation: Remove and audit your build artifacts.

advisories.title: Fake Anchor framework package
advisories.description: Impersonates @coral-xyz/anchor to inject malicious code into Anchor-based dApps.
advisories.remediation: Remove immediately. Use the official @coral-xyz/anchor package.

advisories.title: Fake Metaplex metadata package
advisories.description: Unofficial package that mimics Metaplex functionality but may contain supply chain risks.
advisories.remediation: Remove and use the official @metaplex-foundation packages.
